# Celestial Healing (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Healing Spells|healing]]) \[[[Good Spells|good]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Bloodrager Spells|Bloodrager 1]], [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Magus Spells|Magus 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 1]], [[1st Level Witch Spells|Witch 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, M (1 drop of blood from a good outsider or 1 dose of holy water)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 round/2 levels

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Arcane Anthology, pg. 13

You anoint a wounded creature with the blood of an outsider with the good subtype (such as an [[Angel (Bestiary PF1)|angel]]) or holy water, giving it [[S3.1D-F - Universal Monster Rules D-F (Bestiary 6 Apx)|fast healing]] 1. The target radiates the aura of a good creature for the duration of the spell and can sense the righteousness of the magic, though this has no long-term effect on the targetâ€™s alignment. If the target has its own evil aura, this is not suppressed by *celestial healing*, and can also be detected normally.
